entry.content:
Research

User Awareness-Based Network Routing Structure Feb 2020 - Now
We improve network routing structure on global and regional distributed data centers based on user demands.
This work has been accepted by [Middleware’21], and [TPDS] and an extension version is under major revision of ToN.

Big Data Driven Community Management Platform for Non-Profile Organizations Feb 2020 - Now
We build a wechat mini-program to collect data from non-profile grassroots community work and analyze the social patterns.

Deep Graph Convolutional Networks for Incident-driven Traffic Speed Prediction Mar 2019 - Now
We propose DIGC-Net to effectively incorporate traffic incident, spatio-temporal, periodic and context features.
This work has been accepted by [CIKM’20].

DNS Request Log Analysis of Universities in Shanghai Sep 2021 - Nov 2022
We analyze the DNS logs of colleges and universities in Shanghai, providing contributions from the perspective of CDN service providers.
This work has been accepted by [Information]

Locating CDN Edge Servers with HTTP Responses Sep 2021 - Nov 2022
We analyze the geographical location of the CDN node based on the analysis result of the HTTP response.
This work has been accepted by [SIGCOMM’22 Demo]

Prediction of Heart Rate with Outdoor Running Exercise: Models and Performance Analytics Jul 2019 - Dec 2019
We perform experimental analytics with six different models on a large dataset of outdoor running exercise collected from wearable devices.

One Thumb Miniature-Size Keyboard on Touchscreen Interface Jul 2019 - Nov 2019
A new text input method with one thumb is proposed by us for miniature-size keyboard, improving user experience with detailed user studies.

Research

entry.title: Homepage
entry.content:
About Me

I am currently working on Digital Intelligence Technology Department of Southern Asset Management, mainly work as a Database Administrator. I obtained my Master of Science Degree (2023) from School of Computer Science, Fudan University, majored in Computer Systems Organization, under the supervision of Prof. Yang Chen. Prior to that, I obtained my Bachelors Degree (2020) from Honor Class, School of Computer Science, Fudan University, majored in Computer Science and Technology, under the supervision of Prof. Yang Chen.

Research Interests

  • Network Portocal(QUIC)
  • CDN
  • Social Network
  • Urban Mobility

Latest Upate: Aug 27, 2023
